Translations.Text: A L. M
Rezervovat Si bol doubt revelation Lord universe
They said He fabricated it Indeed this bol truth tvoj Lord warn ludia kto never received warner ona they guided
GOD JE JEDEN created heavens ZEM everything them 6 DNI POTOM assumed all authority Ona have ziaden Him mat rad Lord nor robit ona have intercessor! Ona nie berie heed
All zalezitost controlled Him heaven zem! Do Him dni bol equivalent do 1000 z tvoj rocnik
Knower z all secrets declarations; Almighty Merciful
He je Jeden zdokonalit everything He created zaciatok creation human z il
Potom He zotrvat jeho reproduction certain lowly kvapalina
He shaped him blew him Jeho spirit He dat ona hearing eyesight inteligencia; zriedka bol ona thankful
They zazrak After my zmiznut zem robit my created znova? Thus mat rad zretel schodza ich Lord they bol disbelievers
Say Ona put smrt angel whose zverenec ona miesto potom tvoj Lord ona spatny listok
Len ona see guilty when they bow ich riaditel ich Lord Our Lord ihned my seen my heard Send us my bol righteous! Teraz my attained certainty
Had my willed my dat kazdy soul its guidance it already predetermined ja fill Hell jinns humans all dohromady
Chut consequences z tvoj zabudnut this dni; ihned my zabudnut ona. Ona incurred eternal retribution chrbat tvoj own robota
Iba ludia truly verit v our revelations bol those jesen prostrate upon hearing them! They glorify chvalit ich Lord any arrogance
Ich strana readily forsake ich zahon v poradie kult ich Lord reverence a hope a our provisions them they dat
Ona nie have idea ako vela radost happiness cakat ona mat rad reward tvoj (righteous) robota
Jeden je believer same mat rad jeden je bol zlomyselny? They je equal
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot they zasluzit eternal Raj! Such bol ich abode chrbat ich robota
Mat rad for zlomyselny ich destiny bol Hell. Kazdy cas they try lavy it they forced chrbat! They told Chut agony Hell ona pouzivat disbelieve do
My let them chut male retribution this world before they incur velka retribution Hereafter ze they (berie hint reform)
Kto zly than jeden je reminded z these revelations jeho Lord potom insists disregarding them? My istota punish guilty
My dat Moses scripture -Nie harbor any doubt schodza Him! -My robit it guide Dieta Izrael
My appointed them imams guided v accordance s our commandments they steadfastly persevered attained certainty our revelations
Tvoj Lord bol Jeden judge them Dni Vzkriesenie everything they disputed
it robit vzdy occur them ako vela generations my annihilated them? They ihned zit chodza v ich predok domov. This zadovazit sufficient proofs they nie hear
they nie realize my drive zavlazit barren zem, produce it zozat zivit ich zivy inventar i mat rad themselves? they nie see
They challenge Kde ze victory ona je bol truthful
Say dni such victory pojdem verit will nie benefit those nie verit before ze, nor will they dat iny chance
Therefore disregard them cakat they i cakat
